story_title: Saving Maria's Foot: A Diabetic Bypass Story

panels.title: The Non-Healing Wound
panels.scene: Maria Torres, 62, examining her foot ulcer at home
panels.dialogue: "Llevo tres meses y no sana..." (I've had this for three months and it won't heal...)
panels.educational_focus: Diabetic foot ulcers as warning sign of vascular disease

panels.title: Arriving at Vascular Clinic
panels.scene: Maria arrives at hospital with daughter Elena
panels.dialogue: "Mi mamá necesita ver al cirujano vascular." (My mom needs to see the vascular surgeon.)

panels.title: Meeting Dr. Young Erben
panels.dialogue: "Soy la Dra. Young Erben. Hablemos en español si prefiere." (I'm Dr. Young Erben. We can speak Spanish if you prefer.)

panels.title: Examining the Foot
panels.scene: Dr. Erben carefully examining Maria's foot
panels.dialogue: "¿Siente esto?" (Do you feel this?) "Un poco..." (A little...)

panels.title: The ABI Test
key_visuals: Blood pressure cuffs on arm and ankle
panels.dialogue: "Su ABI es 0.38. Eso es muy bajo." (Your ABI is 0.38. That's very low.)
panels.educational_focus: ABI testing for peripheral artery disease

panels.title: Understanding Critical Limb Ischemia
panels.scene: Dr. Erben explaining CLTI with diagram
panels.dialogue: "Las arterias de su pierna están muy bloqueadas. Sin cirugía, podría perder el pie." (The arteries in your leg are very blocked. Without surgery, you could lose your foot.)

panels.title: The Angiogram
panels.dialogue: "Respire hondo y aguante." (Take a deep breath and hold.)

panels.title: Reviewing the Images
panels.dialogue: "Mire, aquí está el bloqueo total. Necesitamos un bypass." (Look, here's the complete blockage. We need a bypass.)

panels.title: Elena's Fear
panels.dialogue: "¿Mi mamá va a perder la pierna?" (Is my mom going to lose her leg?) "Vamos a hacer todo lo posible." (We're going to do everything possible.)

panels.title: Decision for Surgery
panels.dialogue: "Sí, quiero la cirugía. Quiero caminar otra vez." (Yes, I want the surgery. I want to walk again.)

panels.title: Pre-Op Preparation
panels.dialogue: "La cirugía va a durar varias horas." (The surgery will take several hours.)

panels.title: Dr. Erben's Dedication
panels.dialogue: "Tibial posterior a dorsalis pedis. Vena safena invertida." (Posterior tibial to dorsalis pedis. Reversed saphenous vein.)

panels.title: Operating Room Setup
panels.dialogue: "Vamos a necesitar magnificación 4x para las anastomosis." (We'll need 4x magnification for the anastomoses.)

panels.title: Spinal Anesthesia
panels.dialogue: "Sentirá presión pero no dolor." (You'll feel pressure but no pain.)

panels.title: Surgical Positioning
panels.dialogue: "Paciente lista. Comenzamos." (Patient ready. Let's begin.)

panels.title: Harvesting the Vein
panels.dialogue: "Vena safena de buena calidad. Perfecto para el bypass." (Good quality saphenous vein. Perfect for the bypass.)

panels.title: Reversing the Vein
panels.dialogue: "Invertimos la vena para que las válvulas no bloqueen el flujo." (We reverse the vein so the valves don't block flow.)

panels.title: Finding the Posterior Tibial
panels.dialogue: "Aquí está la tibial posterior. Todavía tiene flujo débil." (Here's the posterior tibial. Still has weak flow.)

panels.title: Exposing the Dorsalis Pedis
panels.dialogue: "La dorsalis pedis es pequeña pero suficiente." (The dorsalis pedis is small but sufficient.)

panels.title: Proximal Anastomosis
panels.dialogue: "8-0 prolene. Puntos interrumpidos precisos." (8-0 prolene. Precise interrupted sutures.)

panels.title: Tunneling the Graft
panels.dialogue: "Túnel subcutáneo para proteger el injerto." (Subcutaneous tunnel to protect the graft.)

panels.title: Distal Anastomosis
panels.dialogue: "La anastomosis más difícil. Requiere paciencia máxima." (The most difficult anastomosis. Requires maximum patience.)

panels.title: Releasing the Clamps
panels.dialogue: "Momento de verdad. Liberamos flujo." (Moment of truth. Releasing flow.)

panels.title: The Foot Turns Pink!
key_visuals: Foot changing from pale to pink
panels.dialogue: "¡Miren! El pie se pone rosado. ¡Pulso fuerte!" (Look! The foot is turning pink. Strong pulse!)

panels.title: Doppler Confirms Flow
panels.dialogue: "Escuchen ese sonido hermoso. Flujo triphasic perfecto." (Listen to that beautiful sound. Perfect triphasic flow.)

panels.title: Closing the Incisions
panels.dialogue: "Cierre meticuloso para prevenir infección." (Meticulous closure to prevent infection.)

panels.title: Post-Op Recovery
panels.dialogue: "¿Cómo está mi pie?" (How's my foot?) "¡Rosado y caliente!" (Pink and warm!)

panels.title: First Steps
panels.dialogue: "Poco a poco. Sus arterias ahora tienen sangre." (Little by little. Your arteries now have blood.)

panels.title: Wound Healing Check
panels.dialogue: "La úlcera está sanando. Veo tejido rosado saludable." (The ulcer is healing. I see healthy pink tissue.)

panels.title: Diabetes Education
panels.dialogue: "Controlar su azúcar es clave para mantener el bypass funcionando." (Controlling your sugar is key to keeping the bypass working.)

panels.title: The Complete Healing
panels.dialogue: "¡La úlcera está completamente sanada!" (The ulcer is completely healed!)

panels.title: Walking Without Pain
panels.dialogue: "Puedo caminar sin dolor. ¡Es un milagro!" (I can walk without pain. It's a miracle!)

panels.title: Maria's Testimony
panels.scene: Maria sharing her story with others
panels.dialogue: "No ignoren los problemas de sus pies. Busquen ayuda temprano." (Don't ignore foot problems. Seek help early.)

panels.title: The Team's Reflection
panels.scene: Dr. Erben discussing case with team
panels.dialogue: "Distal bypasses are challenging but save limbs. Each patient deserves this chance." (Distal bypasses are challenging but save limbs. Each patient deserves this chance.)

panels.title: Dancing at Family Party
panels.dialogue: "Gracias a la Dra. Erben, puedo bailar con mi nieta." (Thanks to Dr. Erben, I can dance with my granddaughter.)
